column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " Hey , front row seats !
#Text=" Xin Fu says : " Welcome to Earth Rumble VI !
#Text=I am your host , Xin Fu !
#Text=" Katara says : " This is just going to be a bunch of guys chucking rocks at each other , is n't it ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " That 's what I paid for .
#Text=" Xin Fu says : " The rules are simple .
#Text=Just knock the other guy out of the ring , and you win !
#Text=Round one : The Boulder vs. The Big Bad Hippo !
#Text=" The Boulder says : " Listen up , Hippo .
#Text=You may be big , but you ai n't bad !
#Text=The Boulder 's gon na win this in a landslide !
#Text=" The Hippo says : " Hippo ... mad !
#Text=" Xin Fu says : " Unbelievable , ladies and gentlemen !
#Text=The Hippo is rocking the boat !
#Text=" Xin Fu says : " The Boulder wins !
#Text=" Katara says : " How about The Boulder ?
#Text=He 's got some good moves .
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't know .
#Text=Bumi said I need a teacher who listens to the earth .
#Text=He 's just listening to his big muscles .
#Text=What do you think , Sokka ?
#Text=" Xin Fu says : " Next match ... The Boulder versus Fire Nation Man !
#Text=" Fire Nation Man says : " Please , to rise for Fire Nation national anthem !
#Text=Fire Lord , my flame burns for thee !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Go back to the Fire Nation !
#Text=" Fire Nation Man says : " No , no , please !
#Text="
